content.body: but I guess built-in matchers will be hard to specify

content.body: i don't think most of them will be

content.body: eg, Boolean's matcher is "does it have a [[BooleanData]] internal slot", etc
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: eg, Boolean's matcher is "does it have a [[BooleanData]] internal slot", etc

content.body: the only one that's tricky will be the error subclasses, because those will be like "has a [[ErrorData]] internal slot, and also "constructor is %TypeError%" or something
